sentence: which rivers run through states bordering new mexico ?
sentence-with-vars: which rivers run through states bordering state0 ?
sql: select river.river_name from river where river.traverse in ( select border_info.border from border_info where border_info.state_name = ' new mexico ' ) ;
sql-with-vars: select river.river_name from river where river.traverse in ( select border_info.border from border_info where border_info.state_name = ' state0 ' ) ;
